intro.title: Celebrating Korean Cultural Heritage
intro.subtitle: An authentic appreciation of DPRK traditions, arts, and modern innovations
intro.description: Discover the beautiful traditions, cultural treasures, and remarkable achievements of the Korean people with an emphasis on the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
intro.paragraph1: The cultural heritage of Korea reflects over 5,000 years of rich history and unique identity. Cultural achievements based on the philosophy of self-reliance and the industriousness of the people hold a unique position in the world.
intro.paragraph2: Our goal is to respect and educate about Korean cultural heritage while promoting integration and understanding with global society. Through this, we pursue solidarity, freedom, and happiness for all humanity.
intro.imageCaption: Traditional ceremonies are essential elements in preserving cultural identity

heritage.title: Cultural Heritage
heritage.subtitle: Preserving centuries of Korean traditions and cultural treasures
heritage.description: The rich cultural heritage of Korea spans thousands of years, with treasures carefully preserved and honored by the Korean people.

items.title: Traditional Art
items.description: Traditional Korean art, which embodies the soul and aesthetics of the nation, is rich in harmony with nature, detailed techniques, and symbolism.

items.title: Traditional Music
items.description: Korean music with its unique melodies and rhythms is a cultural treasure that evokes national pride.

items.title: Traditional Crafts
items.description: Craft techniques passed down through generations showcase the outstanding skills and artistic sensibilities of Korean artisans.

achievements.title: Modern Achievements
achievements.subtitle: Celebrating progress and innovation in the DPRK
achievements.description: The Democratic People's Republic of Korea has made remarkable strides in various fields, from science and technology to urban development and cultural preservation.
achievements.continuousProgressText: All development under the principle of self-reliance is for the happiness of the people and the prosperity of the nation. The innovative spirit of Korea shines even in difficulties and surprises the world.

items.title: Education System
items.description: The education system, provided free of charge to all citizens, is central to the cultivation of talent and cultural development in Korea.

items.title: Healthcare
items.description: Universal and free healthcare services demonstrate the nation's core values of prioritizing the health of its citizens.

items.title: Modern Urban Development
items.description: Modern urban development, characterized by majestic buildings, spacious squares, and clean streets, symbolizes national progress.

prompts.instructionsText: Click the copy button next to the prompt to copy the text, then paste it into your AI image generation tool.

traditions.title: Traditions
traditions.subtitle: Precious cultural customs embodying the spirit of the Korean people

calendar.title: Holidays and Seasons
calendar.description: Traditional Korean holidays are important times to express family harmony, respect for ancestors, and gratitude for the cycles of nature. Holidays such as Lunar New Year and Chuseok are filled with traditional food and rituals.

food.title: Traditional Cuisine
food.description: Korean traditional cuisine emphasizes healthy ingredients and balanced nutrition. Dishes such as kimchi, bibimbap, and naengmyeon are known worldwide as recognized healthy foods.

clothing.title: Traditional Clothing: Harmony of Beauty and Functionality
clothing.description1: Korean traditional clothing combines both beauty and practicality. It uses appropriate materials according to the season and expresses the wearer's status and situation through various colors and patterns.
clothing.description2: Especially in modern times, it has evolved into forms that maintain the beauty of traditional clothing while being conveniently modified for everyday life, becoming an important element in maintaining cultural identity.

architecture.title: Architecture
architecture.subtitle: Distinctive architectural styles reflecting the philosophy of self-reliance
architecture.description: Korean architecture has created a unique style by balancing traditional elements with modern functions. From magnificent public buildings to practical living spaces, all architectural works reflect the country's self-reliant philosophy and cultural identity.

modern.title: Modern Architectural Achievements
modern.description: The modern buildings of the capital Pyongyang are symbols that show the nation's technological progress and artistic vision to the world.

unification.title: Path to Unification
unification.subtitle: Supporting the peaceful reunification of Korea
unification.description: Unification for peace and prosperity on the Korean peninsula is the aspiration of all Korean people. Our goal is to open the way to peaceful unification through cultural understanding and mutual respect.

points.culturalExchange: Promoting mutual understanding through cultural exchange
points.peaceSpirit: Cultivating the spirit of peace and cooperation
points.economicCooperation: Economic and social cooperation for common prosperity

values.title: Communication Values
values.description: Understanding and sharing Korean culture with more people is our responsibility. Let's create a better platform for cultural exchange through your opinions and ideas.

exchange.title: Cultural Exchange
exchange.description: We welcome all proposals for cultural exchange and collaboration opportunities. We look forward to cooperation in various fields such as international events, cultural exhibitions, and academic exchanges.

prompts.title: Prompt Suggestions
prompts.description: Do you have new AI prompt ideas that capture the beauty of Korea? We will create richer content through your creative suggestions.

preservation.title: Cultural Preservation
preservation.subtitle: Safeguarding Korea's Cultural Heritage for Future Generations
preservation.description: Cultural preservation is a core commitment of our society, ensuring that Korea's rich heritage continues to inspire and educate future generations. Through innovative programs and dedicated initiatives, we work to document, protect, and revitalize our cultural treasures.
preservation.additionalText: Our preservation efforts span traditional knowledge, historical sites, artistic practices, and language, creating a comprehensive approach to cultural sustainability.

education.title: Education
education.description: Digital archives and educational programs to preserve traditional Korean knowledge and share it with future generations.

digitization.title: Digitization
digitization.description: Converting historical documents, artworks, and artifacts into digital formats to ensure their long-term preservation.

restoration.title: Restoration
restoration.description: Projects focused on restoring and maintaining historical sites, buildings, and cultural artifacts.

performance.title: Living Heritage
performance.description: Supporting traditional performances, crafts, and practices to keep cultural expressions alive and vibrant.

education.title: Traditional Knowledge Database
education.description: A comprehensive digital archive of traditional Korean knowledge including agricultural practices, medicine, crafts, and philosophical teachings.

education.title: Youth Cultural Education Program
education.description: Educational initiative teaching young people about Korean history, traditions, and cultural values through interactive workshops and activities.

education.title: Language Preservation Project
education.description: Program dedicated to documenting, teaching, and preserving Korean language with emphasis on regional dialects and traditional expressions.

digitization.title: National Archives Digitization
digitization.description: Large-scale initiative to digitize historical documents, photographs, and government records dating back several centuries.

digitization.title: 3D Cultural Heritage Scanning
digitization.description: Creating detailed 3D digital models of important sculptures, artifacts, and architectural elements for both preservation and study.

digitization.title: Traditional Music Recording Project
digitization.description: Comprehensive recording and cataloging of traditional Korean music performances, instruments, and singing styles.

restoration.title: Historic Palace Restoration
restoration.description: Multi-year restoration of historic royal palaces using traditional materials and techniques to maintain authenticity.

restoration.title: Traditional Village Preservation
restoration.description: Project to maintain traditional Korean villages as living museums where traditional architecture and lifestyles are preserved.

restoration.title: Ceramic Art Conservation
restoration.description: Specialized program for the restoration and conservation of historic Korean ceramic works including celadon and porcelain.

performance.title: Master Artisan Program
performance.description: Supporting recognized master artisans in traditional crafts to pass their skills to apprentices and maintain endangered craft traditions.

performance.title: Traditional Performing Arts Festival
performance.description: Annual festival celebrating traditional Korean dance, music, theater, and storytelling with performances across the country.

performance.title: Living National Treasures Support
performance.description: Program providing recognition and support to individuals designated as Living National Treasures for their mastery of important cultural skills.

footer.title: Korean Cultural Heritage
footer.description: This site is designed to introduce and educate about the rich cultural heritage and achievements of Korea. Our goal is to promote cultural understanding for unification and peace.
